content: When ever you allow the government to ban or restrict something, it becomes a more valuable commodity and the criminal element moves in to provide it. SJW’s are bullies who only want their point of view heard and fear conversion by those that have not yet heard the word they espouse. Freedom is freedom. The left is becoming more fascist day by day. Failed bans, guns, drugs and crime are good examples of utopia gone bad. None have worked as bans. Offensive speech should be allowed because the majority of people do not care about your feelings. https://jjreuter.wordpress.com/
